rules: Rule1: Provided that popcorn is heated, it follows that popcorn is ready.
Rule2: Either popcorn is placed in the microwave or it is placed in the toaster.
Rule3: Whenever popcorn is placed in the toaster, it becomes heated.
Rule4: In the event that margarine is heated, margarine is liquid.
Rule5: If wood polish is on the table, then wood polish is flammable.
Rule6: Provided that wood polish is on the table, wood polish is combustible.
Rule7: Either wood polish is on the table, or, if margarine is heated then margarine is melted.
Rule8: Given that wood polish is in the cabinet, wood polish is not on the table.
Rule9: Wood polish is in the cabinet or wood polish is in the garage.
Rule10: Provided that wood polish is in the garage, then wood polish is not on the table.
Rule11: If water is spilled, then water is not cleaned up.
Rule12: Assuming water is mopped, then if water is spilled, water is cleaned up.
Rule13: Water is dried or water is mopped.
Rule14: Water is evaporated or water is not dried.
Rule15: Whenever wood polish is combustible, wood polish is dangerous.
Rule16: On the condition that wood polish is dangerous, wood polish is hazardous.
Rule17: If margarine is a dairy product, then whenever popcorn is placed in the microwave, popcorn is cooking.
Rule18: In the event that margarine is spreadable, margarine is a dairy product.
Rule19: Under the condition that margarine is yellow, margarine is spreadable.
Rule20: Margarine is in the fridge or margarine is on the counter.
Rule21: Provided that margarine is on the counter, then if margarine is butter, margarine is yellow.
Rule22: Assuming margarine is cold, then if margarine is in the fridge, it follows that if margarine is butter, margarine is yellow.
Rule23: Margarine is at room temperature or margarine is cold.
Rule24: Given that margarine is opened, margarine is used.
Rule25: Provided that margarine is unopened, then if margarine is liquid, margarine is melted.
Rule26: Under the condition that margarine is new, margarine is opened.
Rule27: Whenever margarine is old, margarine is unopened.
Rule28: If margarine is purchased, then margarine is new or margarine is old.
Rule29: Margarine is expensive, or margarine is discounted, or margarine is on sale, or margarine is purchased.

Rule30: Assuming the toaster is functional, then if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if popcorn is ready implies the microwave is not plugged in, then the microwave is on, implies the microwave is heating, then the microwave is broken.
Rule31: Given that the toaster is checked, then if the toaster uses electricity, the toaster is functional.
Rule32: The toaster is checked or the toaster is inspected.
Rule33: In the event that the toaster is inspected, then provided the toaster uses electricity, the toaster is functional.
Rule34: If popcorn is cooking, then popcorn is ready.
Rule35: Provided that it is not the case that if margarine is butter then if popcorn is placed in the microwave, popcorn is cooking, then margarine is heated.
Rule36: Under the condition that it is not the case that if margarine is butter then if popcorn is placed in the microwave, popcorn is cooking, then water is spilled.
Rule37: Should it not be the case that if wood polish is hazardous then wood polish is not flammable, then wood polish is safe.

Rule38: Assuming it is not the case that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that popcorn is ready implies the microwave is not plugged in, then the microwave is on, then the microwave is not heating.
Rule39: Whenever popcorn is not ready, the microwave is plugged in.
facts: Fact3: It is not the case that margarine is melted.
Fact4: The microwave is not on.
Fact6: Wood polish is not safe.
Fact7: Margarine is not at room temperature.
Fact9: The microwave is not broken.
